channel.title: Comments on: Marco Tempest – PhoneCam Magician
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: All this true, yet still fun to watch :)
item.content:encoded: All this true, yet still fun to watch :)

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description: Well all this magic seem to use the "get out of the picture and return another object". In #2, you can see that he's not really writing on the paper what is written there in the end (He even shows the other side of the paper). In #3, you can see that he's got a watch, and he's friend doesn't, and there's a point, before you see the "switch" where you see the clocked hand, with the magician in the background, implying a 3rd person is invloved, and you can also hear them running into place. In #4, I suspect a stunt double is involved as the name of the video implies.
item.content:encoded:
Well all this magic seem to use the “get out of the picture and return another object”.
In #2, you can see that he’s not really writing on the paper what is written there in the end (He even shows the other side of the paper).
In #3, you can see that he’s got a watch, and he’s friend doesn’t, and there’s a point, before you see the “switch” where you see the clocked hand, with the magician in the background, implying a 3rd person is invloved, and you can also hear them running into place.
In #4, I suspect a stunt double is involved as the name of the video implies.
